28212CD1.Line7.8CA44: My pipe! I left my pipe back in the chapel! We must go back and get it!

30FA977F.VoiceDir9.6D03F: Angry, frustrated. Your companion is freaking out over a very minor inconvenience.

5A43C04B.Line1.8CA44: Oh… oh, no! No! Back! We need to go back!

6F4EA45C.Line11.8CA44: Bah! Fine, but I won’t forget this betrayal, Deckard, you know I won’t!

972A92FE.VoiceDir7.8CA44: This is a true life-or-death issue. Said straight with horror.

C1F13152.Line9.6D03F: Old man, if you turn your back now, I’ll be the first to bury a blade in it!

C94D2678.VoiceDir1.8CA44: high energy. True desperation and horror

FD11A47B.VoiceDir5.6D03F: genuine serious concern. Your travelling companion is horrified by something.
